security.csp: default-src 'self' kairogui: asset: https://asset.localhost https://cdn.jsdelivr.net; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' blob: kairogui: https://cdn.jsdelivr.net; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' kairogui: https://cdn.jsdelivr.net; img-src 'self' data: asset: kairogui: https://asset.localhost https:; font-src 'self' data: asset: kairogui: https://asset.localhost https://cdn.jsdelivr.net; connect-src 'self' https: asset: kairogui: https://asset.localhost; worker-src 'self' blob:

bundle.longDescription: KairoNotes is a modern, cross-platform document editor with syntax highlighting, multi-language support, and plugin extensibility.
